General.Name: Schroder Japan Growth Fund
General.Description: Schroder Japan Trust plc formerly known as Schroder Japan Growth Fund plc is an open-ended equity mutual fund launched and managed by Schroder Investment Management Limited. The fund invests in the public equity markets of Japan. It invests in stocks of companies operating across diversified sectors. The fund typically invests in value stocks of companies. It benchmarks the performance of its portfolio against the TSE First Section Total Return Index. Schroder Japan Trust plc was formed on July 11, 1994 and is domiciled in the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 London Wall Place, London, United Kingdom, EC2Y 5AU
